name: Potions (Magic Item Category)
guidance: Potions are magical brews or oils; a typical potion is 1 ounce in a vial.
Drinking or administering a potion is a Bonus Action; oils may require more time as described.
Potions are consumable and take effect immediately when used.
If potions are mixed, roll on the Potion Miscibility table for each added potion and reveal effects when they become evident.
